conversations.body_text: Hi James Mitchell,  Your parcel has been dispatched. Here is your tracking link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045993558605,SF6045993558710,SF6045993558747  ​However, we regret to inform you that our express delivery service to Australia has been suspended. We are currently preparing a warehouse in Australia. Your parcel is expected to arrive around the 6th. We will refund the additional shipping charges you paid. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
